Hymn.Arabic: يُحِبُّ الرَّحْمَةَ وَالْحُكْمَ ، اِمْتَلَأتِ الْأَرْضُ مِنْ رَحْمَةِ الرَّبِّ
Hymn.English: 5 He loves righteousness and justice; The earth is full of the goodness of the Lord.

Hymn.Arabic: بِكَلِمَةِ الرَّبِّ تَشَدَّدَتِ السَّمَاوَاتُ ، وَبِرُوحِ فِيهِ كُلُّ قُوَّاتِهَا. هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 6 By the word of the Lord the heavens were made, And all the host of them by the breath of His mouth.     Alleluia
